experiences.description:
本然创新成立于2009年，是中国产品创新咨询服务的先行者。我们致力于帮助
企业发现和定义新产品的机会，概念与策略。
我们的客户是来自不同而领域的
领导企业，耳熟能详的名字包括科勒，索尼，三星，OPPO，魅族，联想，广汽
丰田，广汽传祺，长安汽车，博士西门子，惠而浦，苏泊尔，方太，老板，美
的，长虹，奥克斯，阿克苏诺贝尔，罗莱家纺，迪卡侬，奥的斯，3M,通力等。
Established in 2009, ORIGIN+ is the pioneer of product innovation consulting 
firm in China. We are dedicated in helping business discover and define 
the opportunity, concept and strategy for new product. Our clients consist 
of leaders from various industries, including those well-known names : 
Kohler,Sony,Samsung,  OPPO, Meizu,Lenovo,TOYOTA, GuangZhou Auto, 
ChangAn Auto, BSH, Whirlpool, Supor,Fotile,Robam,Midea,Changhong,Aux, 
AkzonNobel,LuoLai,Decathlon, Otis,3M,KONE etc.

experiences.title: Director Of Product Development

experiences.description: 6 years Establishing China studio of global design from scratch,  covering the region of greater China, Indian, East Europe and Latin American, serving all modalities in a full spectrum : product definition, product design, UX/UI design and service design. Paying great efforts to place design in a more strategic role in the "ICFC( in China for China) strategy for GE Healthcare, making design the partner of product strategy and planning in the very early stage of NPD process. Introducing User-centric approach and design thinking to whole R&D and

product organization. 
Leading the design team for global marketing,GE Plastics, reporting to GM of 
global design. 
Using design as a tool to explore the future opportunity of the innovative 
application of plastic resin, which gave critical possibilities for marketing 
strategy and material R&D as well. 
Closely collaborating with industry leaders on the most forward looking areas

experiences.title: Design Manager

experiences.description:
computing etc. 
Working as a senior design consultant for GE/FITCH, which was a joint 
venture of GE Plastic and Fitch worldwide at the time. 
Providing pretty hard-core design services such as DFMA to GE Plastics, 
and strategic design services such as PI ( product identity) to other clients in 
Greater China and SEA .
experiences.title: Senior Design Consultant

experiences.description:
Page 2 of 3 
As the pioneer of in-house industrial designer in China,  providing product 
design service to Midea and other benefit-conflict free external clients.  Beside 
using the very old school design techniques of hand sketching, hand rendering 
and hand made prototypes, we were the pioneers of adopting contemporary 
design techniques, such 2D rendering, 3D modeling and 3D printing back then. 
As the major driver, to help import user-centric approach into design process, 
including adoption  of  user research and UX/UI design  .
experiences.title: lead designer / design manager
